May 17, 2008 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Tredegar Leisure Centre Best Instrumentalist - Dewi Griffiths (solo cornet|) Tredegar Best horn - Chris Davies (Tredegar) Prizes - 1st £230, 2nd £170, 3rd £150. 6 bands competed
Oct. 27, 2009, 5:51 p.m. June 30, 2020, 1:30 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Ian Porthouse Vienna Nights
2 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Gareth Pritchard Vienna Nights
3 Tylorstown Band Gary Davies Diversions on a Bass Theme
4 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Colin Hogg Diadem of Gold
5 Abergavenny Borough Band Gareth Ritter The Judges of the Secret Court (Les Francs Juges)
6 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland Dances and Alleluias
Withdrawn Pontardulais Town Band Paul Jenkins
